alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:13PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Harding County through 700 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of South Cave Hills, or 8 miles north of Buffalo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buffalo around 625 PM MDT. Slim Buttes around 635 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
